lead_paragraph: VOLLERS--Joseph E. Jr.,77, on February 17, 2016. Graduated Alfred University; a pioneer in software systems design, founder of Systems and Communications Group, Inc. He leaves behind his wife, Annette, five children and six grandchildren. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  VOLLERS, JOSEPH E. JR.
